originalText.text: We had a new heat pump and gas furnace installed by Hendricks Heating & Cooling Co. Their estimator was helpful but not pushy. Their offer was slightly lower than the others we received. The installation crew arrived on time, was pleasant, and worked quickly. I was impressed by how the installation crew's senior member went out of his way to teach the junior members. I have no hesitation in recommending them.

text.text: We had a new heat pump and gas furnace installed by Hendricks Heating & Cooling Co. Their estimator was helpful but not pushy. Their offer was slightly lower than the others we received. The installation crew arrived on time, was pleasant, and worked quickly. I was impressed by how the installation crew's senior member went out of his way to teach the junior members. I have no hesitation in recommending them.

originalText.text: Jeff called prior to his arrival to let me know he was on his way.  He arrived on time and immediately set about his work. He covered his shoes  with booties prior to entering my home,  which I truly appreciated.  Sam was professional, courteous, and personable; I hope I can request him for my next service call.  l will definitely be recommending Hendricks Heating & Cooling Co. to those I know who may be in need of the services offered.  I have already recommended the company this morning to someone I know.

originalText.text: Matt came out and did a fantastic job diagnosing the issue and fixing it! The price was fair and his honesty about the issue with my air unit was refreshing and appreciated! We had been misled by our previous repair company. Thanks Yates! We’ll be using you from now on!

text.text: Matt came out and did a fantastic job diagnosing the issue and fixing it! The price was fair and his honesty about the issue with my air unit was refreshing and appreciated! We had been misled by our previous repair company. Thanks Yates! We’ll be using you from now on!

originalText.text: They were quick to service my needs with the furnace. They came out the next day from my initial call and gave me an acceptable 2nd opinion from another company that came earlier that week. I was also able to get a price quote for parts and service later that same day. I was also able to meet with a sales person within a day or two of calling. All in all I had great service from office staff, technicians and sales reps. Everyone was fast to service. Thanks.

text.text: They were quick to service my needs with the furnace. All in all I had great service from office staff, technicians and sales reps. Everyone was fast to service. Thanks.

originalText.text: I previously used another company that I wasn’t happy with for many years and they weren’t able to pin point my AC issue. As soon as Jeff walked in the door, he knew where the issue was. He is extremely knowledgeable, patient and took the time to explain it to me while providing multiple solutions. Their prices are very competitive as well. I am a customer for life and have already started passing the word to my friends and family, to ask for Jeff specifically!
